summary: Lynn Hughes finds that marriage the second time around is far from idyllic when the ex wife and her children return to manipulate her husband Jack.
cast: Andrea Roth|Brian McNamara|Dan Payne|Laura Soltis|Jill Morrison|Tracy Spiridakos|Ryan McDonell|Ryan Jefferson Booth|Ken Camroux-Taylor|Ali Liebert|Anna Galvin|Ingrid Tesch|Betty Phillips|Rufus Dorsey|Paul Duchart|Dolores Drake|Panthero|Peter Huck
title: El club de las segundas esposas
